channel.title: object detection on Zijie Wang`s Blog
channel.description: Recent content in object detection on Zijie Wang`s Blog

item.title: [论文阅读笔记 -- 域泛化] Gated Domain-Invariant Feature Disentanglement for DGOD (2023)
item.description: 2203.11432 Gated Domain-Invariant Feature Disentanglement for Domain Generalizable Object Detection (2022) 概述 域泛化目标检测任务。 本文提出一种 Gated Domain-Invariant Feature Disentanglement (GDIFD) 方法，沿通道维分离域不变和域特定信息。 模型架构 Channel Gate Module 可视化示例
